cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 320 miles SSW of the Mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: turning north, then accelerating north-northeast across the Gulf Coast, the Southeast U.S., and off the Mid-Atlantic coast late Thursday

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch west of Morgan City to Intracoastal City, LA (Gulf Coast) – not applicable to New England
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City, LA to MS/AL border; Tropical Storm Warning MS/AL border to Walton/Bay County Line, FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast, inland Southeast, Mid-Atlantic coastline
weather_observation.wind: Low (7%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; brief gusts 30–40 mph possible late Thu night/early Fri
weather_observation.rainfall: Periods of moderate to heavy rain late Thu into Fri morning, totals generally 1–2 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: Minor coastal flooding on north-facing beaches and localized tree/limb damage in gusts
